title: ABOUT CHIKKODI-SADALGA
desc: 2. Chikkodi-Sadalga Chikodi-Sadalga, is an Assembly/Vidhan Sabha seat in Mumbai Karnataka region and Belgaum district of Karnataka . It shares inter-state border with Kolhapur District of Maharashtra. Chikkodi-Sadalga is part of 1. Chikkodi Lok Sabha/Parliamentary constituency. This seat is categoried as: Rural.
